channel.title: Muggles on Philipp's blog about it
channel.description: Recent content in Muggles on Philipp's blog about it

item.title: Social Login
item.description: Before we start Have you ever used - or at least seen - the button Login with Facebook on a new web application you wanted to use? I guess for most non-IT people it is quite mysterious what happens if you click this button: You are suddenly logged in, the website knows your name and e-mail address and you don’t even have to set another password for the new website.
